item.title: The information characteristics of YouTube tourism content and their impacts on user satisfaction and intention to visit and share information: the moderating role of word-of-mouth information acceptance
item.description:
This study explores how characteristics of YouTube tourism content influence user satisfaction, and how satisfaction, in turn, affects viewers’ intention to visit a destination and share information with others.

  • Surveyed 244 viewers of YouTube tourism videos
  • Found that usefulness and entertainment value positively affected user satisfaction
  • User satisfaction positively influenced both intention to visit and intention to share
  • Intention to visit also positively influenced intention to share
  • The relationship between satisfaction and sharing was moderated by word-of-mouth information acceptance
